settings.title: Search
settings.text: Use this section to help customers find the products they're looking for.

settings.heading: 70+ Years of Custom-Built Solutions
settings.content: We have four specialized manufacturing divisions, enabling us to design and build precise instrumentation for your project.

settings.heading: Industry-Leading Quality Protocols
settings.content: We have a facility dedicated to product testing, and our rigorous quality control protocols ensure the highest reliability.

settings.heading: Your Project Is The Most Important
settings.content: We believe a “good” product is not enough, and understand the safety & financial implications of the your project.

settings.heading: Parts for the World's Most Important Projects
settings.content: Paquin offers the best of both worlds; we are large enough to handle any size project, but flexible enough to create any custom part or equipment unique to your specific needs.

settings.heading: Superior Quality, Innovation and Customer Service Since 1949
settings.content: We are your solutions-oriented manufacturing and distribution hybrid engineering partner.

settings.subheading: Get The Right Part For Your Project
settings.heading: We Scale With You, Providing Both Custom and Stock Parts
settings.content:
Paquin’s sensor-based product portfolio is designed to provide solutions that are outside of the norm. We do this by matching the right product technology to each application requirement. This can only be achieved by putting the goals of our customers first and avoiding a 'one-size-fits-all' business model.

From fresh water to hazardous chemicals and from controlled climates to the harshest on Earth, Paquin produces a wide selection within all our product categories.
settings.cta:
Require a custom part for your project?
Contact our team today

settings.title: International Electrotechnical Commission System for Certification to Standards Relating to Equipment for Use in Explosive Atmospheres (IECEx System)

settings.heading: Certified Excellence
settings.content: We are dedicated to providing the highest quality, and our commitment to excellence ensures the success of your projects. With the most innovative facilities and experienced staff in the industry, our certifications help attest to our reputation and quality.

settings.heading: Engineering Your Vision: Our Team Is Ready to Build Your Custom Solution
settings.content: The design, construction and delivery of industry-unique control equipment is our passion.

settings.heading_large: Join Our Team and Help Shape the Future of Engineering
settings.content: Join our team and be part of an innovative engineering journey. At Paquin, we value creativity, precision, and a passion for problem-solving, offering roles that challenge and advance your career in a dynamic environment.
